collections.name: all_prevalences

properties.name: item
properties.description: The medical item, disease, or condition being analyzed for prevalence.
sample values: 0.65 Ml Depo Subq Provera 160 Mg/Ml P...

properties.name: population_type
properties.description: The type of population surveyed, typically 'LIVING'.

properties.name: occurrences
properties.description: The number of times the item occurred within the surveyed population.

properties.name: population_count
properties.description: The total number of individuals in the surveyed population.

properties.name: prevalence_rate
properties.description: The rate of occurrence, calculated as occurrences divided by population count.

properties.name: prevalence_percentage
properties.description: The prevalence rate expressed as a percentage.

collections.description: Contains prevalence statistics for various medical items or conditions.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: prevalence_rate = occurrences / population_count and prevalence_percentage = prevalence_rate * 100

collections.name: allergies

properties.name: start
properties.description: The date when the allergy was first recorded or started.

properties.name: stop
properties.description: The date when the allergy was resolved or no longer considered active.

properties.name: patient
properties.description: Identifier for the patient associated with the allergy. Foreign key to the patients table.

properties.name: encounter
properties.description: Identifier for the medical encounter during which the allergy was recorded. Foreign key to the encounters table.

properties.name: code
properties.description: A standardized code (e.g., SNOMED CT) representing the specific allergy.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A text description of the allergy.

collections.description: Records patient allergies, including the start and stop dates of the allergic reaction or diagnosis.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: The duration of the allergy can be calculated as stop_date - start_date.

collections.name: careplans

properties.name: id_
properties.description: Unique identifier for the care plan.

properties.name: start
properties.description: The start date of the care plan.

properties.name: stop
properties.description: The end date of the care plan.

properties.name: patient
properties.description: Identifier for the patient. Foreign key to the patients table.

properties.name: encounter
properties.description: Identifier for the medical encounter associated with the care plan. Foreign key to the encounters table.

properties.name: code
properties.description: A standardized code representing the care plan activity.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A text description of the care plan.

properties.name: reasoncode
properties.description: A standardized code for the condition or reason necessitating the care plan. Foreign key to the conditions table.

properties.name: reasondescription
properties.description: A text description of the reason for the care plan.
sample values: Non-small cell carcinoma of lung  TNM...

collections.description: Documents care plans for patients, including activities, timelines, and the reason for the plan.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: The duration of the care plan can be calculated as stop_date - start_date.

collections.name: claims

properties.name: id_
properties.description: Unique identifier for the claim.

properties.name: patient
properties.description: Identifier for the patient associated with the claim. Foreign key to the patients table.

properties.name: billableperiod
properties.description: The start date of the billable period for the claim.

properties.name: organization
properties.description: The name of the organization submitting the claim.

properties.name: encounter
properties.description: Identifier for the medical encounter associated with the claim. Foreign key to the encounters table.

properties.name: diagnosis
properties.description: The diagnosis associated with the claim.

properties.name: total
properties.description: The total monetary value of the claim.

collections.description: Contains billing claims information for patient encounters.

collections.name: conditions

properties.name: start
properties.description: The start date or date of onset of the condition.

properties.name: stop
properties.description: The date the condition was resolved or ended.

properties.name: patient
properties.description: Identifier for the patient with the condition. Foreign key to the patients table.

properties.name: encounter
properties.description: Identifier for the medical encounter where the condition was diagnosed. Foreign key to the encounters table.

properties.name: code
properties.description: A standardized code (e.g., SNOMED CT) for the medical condition.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A text description of the medical condition.

collections.description: Records medical conditions or diagnoses for patients, including onset and resolution dates.

collections.name: encounters

properties.name: id_
properties.description: Unique identifier for the encounter.

properties.name: date_
properties.description: The date of the encounter.

properties.name: patient
properties.description: Identifier for the patient. Foreign key to the patients table.

properties.name: code
properties.description: A standardized code for the type of encounter.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A text description of the encounter type.

properties.name: reasoncode
properties.description: A code for the reason for the encounter. Foreign key to the conditions table.

properties.name: reasondescription
properties.description: A text description of the reason for the encounter.

collections.description: Records patient encounters with healthcare providers, including the date, type, and reason for the visit.

collections.name: immunizations

properties.name: date_
properties.description: The date the immunization was administered.

properties.name: patient
properties.description: Identifier for the patient who received the immunization. Foreign key to the patients table.

properties.name: encounter
properties.description: Identifier for the medical encounter during which the immunization was given. Foreign key to the encounters table.

properties.name: code
properties.description: A standardized code (e.g., CVX) for the immunization.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A text description of the immunization.

collections.description: Contains records of immunizations administered to patients.

collections.name: medications

properties.name: start
properties.description: The date the medication was started.

properties.name: stop
properties.description: The date the medication was stopped.

properties.name: patient
properties.description: Identifier for the patient. Foreign key to the patients table.

properties.name: encounter
properties.description: Identifier for the medical encounter associated with the medication. Foreign key to the encounters table.

properties.name: code
properties.description: A standardized code (e.g., RxNorm) for the medication.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A text description of the medication.

properties.name: reasoncode
properties.description: A code for the reason the medication was prescribed. Foreign key to the conditions table.

properties.name: reasondescription
properties.description: A text description of the reason for the medication.

collections.description: Lists medications prescribed or administered to patients, including start/stop dates and the reason for prescription.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: The duration of medication use can be calculated as stop_date - start_date.

collections.name: observations

properties.name: date_
properties.description: The date the observation was recorded.

properties.name: patient
properties.description: Identifier for the patient. Foreign key to the patients table.

properties.name: encounter
properties.description: Identifier for the medical encounter during which the observation was made. Foreign key to the encounters table.

properties.name: code
properties.description: A standardized code (e.g., LOINC) for the observation type.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A text description of the observation.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The numerical or categorical value of the observation.

properties.name: units
properties.description: The units of measurement for the observation value.

collections.description: Stores clinical observations and measurements for patients, such as vital signs and lab results.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: A complete observation is formed by combining description, value, and units. For example: Body Height (description) is 166.03 (value) cm (units).

collections.name: patients

properties.name: patient
properties.description: Unique identifier for the patient.

properties.name: birthdate
properties.description: The patient's date of birth.

properties.name: deathdate
properties.description: The patient's date of death. If null, the patient is assumed to be alive.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: The age of the patient can be calculated as deathdate - birthdate. If deathdate is null, the patient is considered alive.

properties.name: ssn
properties.description: The patient's Social Security Number.

properties.name: drivers
properties.description: The patient's driver's license number.

properties.name: passport
properties.description: The patient's passport number.

properties.name: prefix
properties.description: The patient's name prefix (e.g., Mr., Mrs.).

properties.name: first
properties.description: The patient's first name.

properties.name: last
properties.description: The patient's last name.

properties.name: suffix
properties.description: The patient's name suffix (e.g., MD, PhD).

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: A suffix like PhD, JD, or MD may indicate a doctoral degree.

properties.name: maiden
properties.description: The patient's maiden name, if applicable.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: This field is typically populated for married individuals who have changed their last name.

properties.name: marital
properties.description: The patient's marital status.

properties.name: race
properties.description: The patient's race.

properties.name: ethnicity
properties.description: The patient's ethnicity.

properties.name: gender
properties.description: The patient's gender.

properties.name: birthplace
properties.description: The patient's place of birth.

properties.name: address
properties.description: The patient's home address.

collections.description: Contains demographic and personal information for each patient.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: A patient's full name can be constructed from the prefix, first, last, and suffix columns.

collections.name: procedures

properties.name: date_
properties.description: The date the procedure was performed.

properties.name: patient
properties.description: Identifier for the patient. Foreign key to the patients table.

properties.name: encounter
properties.description: Identifier for the medical encounter during which the procedure was performed. Foreign key to the encounters table.

properties.name: code
properties.description: A standardized code (e.g., SNOMED CT) for the procedure.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A text description of the procedure.

properties.name: reasoncode
properties.description: A code for the reason the procedure was performed. Foreign key to the conditions table.

properties.name: reasondescription
properties.description: A text description of the reason for the procedure.

collections.description: Details of medical procedures performed on patients, including the reason for the procedure.
